title: Adidas kicks it classic casual with clipless Velosamba Cycling Shoes
content:
Dig the styling of the new Adidas “Road Cycling Shoes,” but looking for something a little more… casual? It doesn’t get much more classic Adidas than their Samba. And now, you’ll be able to take to the streets in the Velosamba – that’s an SPD compatible Samba, of course. From the side, it would be […]

The post Adidas kicks it classic casual with clipless Velosamba Cycling Shoes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
